channel.title: Azn clients gettting into server >.<
channel.description:
is there anyway to detect when an hacking client gets into the server? or soemway to auto bann, or so they cant do anything on it
for example: if spawner is owner=true "safe" if spawner is owner=false "ipban"
and te same for getting moded, and all the comands.
this is urgent, the co-owner of the client i'm in got hacked >.<

item.title: Azn clients gettting into server >.<
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Just request a certain UID and make your client have this unique uid… not hard at all? lol

Read full topic

item.title: Azn clients gettting into server >.<
item.dc:creator: @Anfernio Anfernio
item.description:
@Anfernio wrote:

What the fuck?

If I get what you’re saying, most sources have a ‘validClient’ installed. You just need to fix it up to work.

public void validcheck() { if(validClient == false){ system.out.println("Player has logged in with invalid client! User has been banned."); banned = true; } } if(validClient == true){ system.out.println("Player has logged in with valid client! Connection allowed."); }

or something?

Read full topic
